properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 18 at 9:13AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning is cancelled for the Tombigbee River At Bevill
Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Gainesville
Lock and Dam and at Demopolis Lock and Dam...

.Water levels have fallen below flood stage on the Tombigbee River at
Bevill Lock and Dam. Any minor overflow has now returned to its banks
at this location. However...levels remain elevated on the Tombigbee
River at Gainesville Lock and Dam and at Demopolis Lock and Dam. Levels
continue to fall at all three locations.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 8:15 AM Saturday the stage was 76.7 feet.
* Flood stage is 68 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue to fall to a stage of 76.1 feet
by tomorrow morning .
* Impact...At 68 feet...Flooding of lowlands in the area occurs and
cattle should be moved to higher ground.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

This is the last flood statement for Bevill Lock and Dam for this event.
Another statement will be issued by Sunday morning for Gainesville Lock
and Dam and Demopolis Lock and Dam...or sooner if conditions warrant.
